name: Cutie Collector
description:
Cutie Collector Starring Polly

Made for Ruin Jam 2014

Take control of Polly! The internet gaming music phenomenon as she goes out to collect all the cuties ruining Video Games! But watch out! The Neckbeards are flying in to bring about their own oppression. Can you collect all the cuties and ruin Video Games forever?

Controls:

Move - Arrow Keys

Cuties:

- Doggie

- Kittie

- Crono Maniac

- Nero the Social Justice Pirate

- Female Developer

Created in Game Maker Studio

Programmed by Thomas L. "Jetstorm4"

Graphics by Thomas L. "Jetstorm4"

Nero the Social Justice Pirate by Ruin Jam 2014

Sound Effects from RPG Maker 2003 RTP

Music - Pixel Peeker Polka Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Made for Ruin Jam 2014
